name: You. The paddle.
description:
WASD to move. Move cursor to aim. Dont let them hit your back! 3 lives.

Main playtesting ended. Fixed game making it playable. No other bugs were fixed so.. gl lol

Uploaded fixed version of game. Will swap played demo with fixed version after playtesting. I forgot to restart the spawn countdown which mean the next wave never spawns which means the game gets stuck in a no lose state.
